page.title: 04 FARMING continued
page.content: All farms were very well mechanised and consequently very few workers were employed per farm. This would have been 8 to 10 times more 50 years ago. In all 17 workers were employed. All the farmers had been in the area for many years with an average of almost 50 years. The shortest being 14 years and the longest 140 years. Needless to say they all said that they liked living in the area and only a few expressed any desire for changes. These included better shopping and market facilities and more work in the area.
